examples: Some people with schizophrenia show a loss of neural tissue, and it’s unclear whether this atrophy is a result of the disease itself or drug-induced suppression of signaling.
What we found was, if you do enough resistive exercise, you can halt the effects of the bone loss and the muscle atrophy.
And you know, that that's that's really been atrophying anyway with Trump's trade war with China.
Those muscles that would have held you back that are now being held by something else will quickly atrophy and decondition.
All of the bomb shelters and other protection that we had during the Cold War have all atrophied and basically been shut down.
words.defineEn: a decrease in size of an organ caused by disease or disuse
words.defineVi: giảm kích thước của một cơ quan do bệnh tật hoặc không sử dụng

examples: They've suffered a heart attack, maybe two.
I was afraid he might have a heart attack or something!
I was afraid he might have a heart attack or something!
Ignoring warning signs of a heart attack and continuing to smoke and eat unhealthy foods is asking for a heart attack and can increase the likelihood of serious health problems.
Ignoring warning signs of a heart attack and continuing to smoke and eat unhealthy foods is asking for a heart attack and can increase the likelihood of serious health problems.
words.defineEn: a medical emergency that happens when blood flow to the heart is suddenly blocked, which is fatal in some cases
words.defineVi: một trường hợp cấp cứu y tế xảy ra khi máu chảy vào tim đột ngột bị tắc nghẽn, có thể gây tử vong trong một số trường hợp

words.defineEn: effects (as nosebleed or nausea) of oxygen deficiency in the blood and tissues at high altitudes
words.defineVi: ảnh hưởng (như chảy máu cam hoặc buồn nôn) do thiếu oxy trong máu và các mô ở độ cao lớn

words.defineEn: wooziness and nausea caused by the rocking motion of a boat or ship
words.defineVi: chóng mặt và buồn nôn do chuyển động lắc lư của thuyền hoặc tàu

words.defineEn: an illness characterized by high fever and caused by prolonged exposure to excessive heat or sunlight
words.defineVi: một căn bệnh đặc trưng bởi sốt cao và do tiếp xúc lâu với nhiệt độ quá cao hoặc ánh sáng mặt trời

examples: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
At one stroke, the country lost two outstanding leaders.
stroke a nerve didn't I?
The nurses had to spoon-feed my mother after her stroke.
They added 230 customers to their list at a stroke.
words.defineEn: a dangerous condition in which a person loses consciousness as a result of a blood vessel breaking open or becoming blocked in their brain, which could kill or paralyze a part of their body
words.defineVi: một tình trạng nguy hiểm trong đó một người mất ý thức do mạch máu bị vỡ hoặc tắc nghẽn trong não, có thể giết chết hoặc làm tê liệt một phần cơ thể của họ

words.defineEn: absence of systole; failure of the ventricles of the heart to contract (usually caused by ventricular fibrillation) with consequent absence of the heart beat leading to oxygen lack and eventually to death
words.defineVi: không có tâm thu; tâm thất của tim không co bóp được (thường do rung tâm thất gây ra) với hậu quả là tim không đập dẫn đến thiếu oxy và cuối cùng là tử vong

words.defineEn: destruction of heart tissue resulting from obstruction of the blood supply to the heart muscle
words.defineVi: phá hủy mô tim do tắc nghẽn cung cấp máu cho cơ tim

words.defineEn: localized necrosis resulting from obstruction of the blood supply
words.defineVi: hoại tử cục bộ do tắc nghẽn nguồn cung cấp máu
